SEARCH
Package wtf.file.api.editable

Schnittstelle EditableWtfImage

Alle Superschnittstellen:
EditableFrame, Frame, WtfImage
public interface EditableWtfImage extends WtfImage, EditableFrame
Represents an editable version of a WtfImage. This interface combines the functionalities of WtfImage and EditableFrame, enabling modifications to the width, height, color space, channel width, animation information, and metadata of the image. Changes can be saved to a file with various compression options.

Methods in this interface allow for direct changes to the properties of the image. The modifications include altering dimensions, color channels, metadata, and animation properties, along with saving the image in different formats and compression levels.

Siehe auch:
  • WtfImage
  • EditableFrame

  • Methodendetails

    • setWidth

      void setWidth(int width) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the width of the editable image. The specified width must be within valid bounds for the image dimensions (0-65 535).

      If the image gets bigger by this, every new pixel will have the default color of this image's color space. If the image gets smaller, data is truncated from the right of the image.

      Parameter:
      width - the new width of the image in pixels
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the specified width is outside the allowed range
      Siehe auch:
      • ColorSpace.defaultColor()

    • setHeight

      void setHeight(int height) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the height of the editable image. The specified height must be within valid bounds for the image dimensions (0-65 535).

      If the image gets larger due to this operation, new rows of pixels will have the default color of this image's color space. If the image gets smaller, data is truncated from the bottom of the image.

      Parameter:
      height - the new height of the image in pixels
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the specified height is outside the allowed range
      Siehe auch:
      • ColorSpace.defaultColor()

    • setColorSpace

      void setColorSpace(ColorSpace colorSpace)
      Sets the color space of the editable image. The color space determines how pixel information is represented, such as the number and type of color channels (e.g., RGB, CMY, HSV) and whether it includes alpha transparency (fixed or dynamic).

      By default, each pixel tries to convert itself to another color space. However, information may be lost. If the conversion fails, the color spaces' default color will be used.

      Parameter:
      colorSpace - the ColorSpace to be applied to the image
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided color space is null or unsupported
      Siehe auch:
      • ColorSpace.defaultColor()

    • setChannelWidth

      void setChannelWidth(int channelWidth) throws NumberOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the channel width of the editable image. The channel width specifies the bit depth per channel, determining the amount of information stored per individual color channel (e.g., red, green, blue) or alpha channel. The value must be within valid bounds for the channel width (1-8).

      The api tries to represent the color as best as possible in the new channel width.

      Parameter:
      channelWidth - the bit depth of each channel, in the range from 1 to 8
      Löst aus:
      NumberOutOfBoundsException - if the specified channel width is outside the allowed range

    • animationInformation

      EditableAnimationInformation animationInformation()
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: WtfImage
      Retrieves animation information associated with the image. The animation information includes details such as the number of frames, frame rate (frames per second), or seconds per frame, and whether the animation metadata is FPS-coded or SPF-coded.
      Angegeben von:
      animationInformation in Schnittstelle WtfImage
      Gibt zurück:
      the AnimationInformation containing details about the animation of the image

    • metadataContainer

      EditableMetadataContainer metadataContainer()
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: WtfImage
      Retrieves the metadata container associated with the image. The metadata container provides functionalities to access and inspect metadata elements associated with the image.
      Angegeben von:
      metadataContainer in Schnittstelle WtfImage
      Gibt zurück:
      the MetadataContainer containing the metadata of the image

    • edit

      default EditableWtfImage edit()
      Returns the current instance of EditableWtfImage. This method is used as a default implementation for editing or modifying the current editable image.
      Angegeben von:
      edit in Schnittstelle WtfImage
      Gibt zurück:
      the current instance of EditableWtfImage

    • save

      void save(Path path, DataCompressionType dataCompressionType) throws IOException, WtfException
      Saves the current editable image to the specified file path using the provided compression settings.
      Parameter:
      path - the file path where the image will be saved; must not be null
      dataCompressionType - the type of compression applied to the image data; must not be null
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the save operation
      WtfException - if an error occurs encoding the image data

    • save

      default void save(Path path) throws IOException, WtfException
      Saves the current editable image to the specified file path using default compression settings. The default settings use mapped compression for the data.
      Parameter:
      path - the file path where the image will be saved; must not be null
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the save operation
      WtfException - if an error occurs encoding the image data
